panels.description: Count of integer/smallint sequences (at risk of exhaustion at 2^31). Grant SELECT on sequences to grafana_mon for pct_used values.
panels.title: Int4 Sequences

panels.description: Indexes in INVALID state (indisvalid=false). Typically from failed CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY. Occupy space but are unused.
panels.title: Invalid Indexes

panels.description: Inactive replication slots prevent WAL cleanup. A forgotten slot can fill Aurora storage without limit.
panels.title: Inactive Repl Slots

panels.description: Prepared transactions open > 1 hour. Block vacuum, retain locks, consume XIDs.
panels.title: Orphaned Prepared Xacts

panels.description: FK and CHECK constraints with convalidated=false. Hidden integrity debt.
panels.title: Not Valid Constraints

panels.description: Tables without primary key (non-empty, >8KB). Blocks logical replication, design smell.
panels.title: Tables w/o Primary Key

panels.description: TOAST tables larger than 100MB. TOAST bloat is invisible to standard size checks. AWS Aurora TOAST OID contention risk.
panels.title: TOAST Tables > 100MB

panels.description: Distribution of wait_event_type + wait_event. Reveals I/O, lock, shared_buffer bottlenecks.
panels.title: Wait Events

panels.description: Distribution of connection states. "idle in transaction" (idlexact) = red flag.
panels.title: Connection States

panels.description: Top queries by WAL bytes generated (pg_stat_statements). Impacts replication lag and storage costs.
panels.title: Top WAL Generators

panels.description: Commits and rollbacks per second (like pgAdmin4 TPS chart)
panels.title: Transactions / sec

panels.description: Connection count by state (like pgAdmin4 Sessions chart)
panels.title: Sessions

panels.description: Inserts, updates, deletes per second (like pgAdmin4 Tuples In)
panels.title: Tuples In

panels.description: Fetched and returned rows per second (like pgAdmin4 Tuples Out)
panels.title: Tuples Out

panels.description: Cache hits vs disk reads per second (like pgAdmin4 Block I/O)
panels.title: Block I/O

panels.description: Top statements by total time (planning + executing + IO)
panels.title: Total time

panels.description: Top statements by IO time (read + write)
panels.title: IO time
